summary: For twelve days in July, 1916, a shark patrolled the waterways of northern New Jersey. This docudrama is based on Richard Fernicola's account of those days.
cast: Colin Egglesfield|Mark Dexter|Jenna Harrison|John Rhys-Davies|Jamie Bartlett|Adrian Galley|Colin Stinton|Roger Dwyer|Patrick Lyster|Nigel Sweet|Paul Ditchfield|Daniel Kriel|Craig Geldenhuys|David Jeffery|Glen Biderman-Pam|Andrew Whaley|Adrienne Pierce|Jean Michel Joubert|Richard Farmer|Lourens Smith|Warrick Grier|George Christopher Smith|Ian Jepson|Christine Truter|Paula Pursch|Robin Rattle|Karl Thaning|Kyle Thaning|Aubrey Sheldon|David Shreeve|Jeff Shapiro|Danny Keogh|Sean Higgs|Denis Smith|Herman Hardick|Pierre Malherbe|Brian Heydenrich|Simon Williams|Ben Chowney|Andre Pelser|Jack Cryans|Lydia Fleming|Jake Mervine
title: La playa del terror
